intro: Nekemias gongshanensis, commonly known as the Gongshan nekemias, is a rare flowering plant native to the Yunnan province in China. It belongs to the family Malvaceae and is characterized by its distinctive leaves and showy flowers. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments, often in mountainous regions. Its botanical features include palmate leaves and clusters of pink or white flowers. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species.
